description:
This dataset consists of map files which show bus routes covering the Greater Manchester area in a selection of GIS file formats.

By downloading this dataset you are indicating your acceptance of the terms of the licence.

Please acknowledge the source of this information using the following attribution statement:

Contains Transport for Greater Manchester data.  Contains OS data © Crown copyright and database right 2016.
title: Bus routes (1:25,000 scale map data)
name: bus-routes-1-25-000-scale-map-data
